Line 26: Line 26:
It has a command line version and a [[GUI]] version. It currently works with [[Ubuntu_%28Linux_distribution%29|Ubuntu]], [[Linux_Mint|Linux Mint]] and Klikit-Linux, and possibly more ubuntu-based distributions. <br>
It has a command line version and a [[GUI]] version. It currently works with [[Ubuntu_%28Linux_distribution%29|Ubuntu]], [[Linux_Mint|Linux Mint]] and Klikit-Linux, and possibly more ubuntu-based distributions. <br>
The latest test version of ubuntu (Hardy Heron, soon to be released), is not yet officially supported, but seems to work fine.
The latest test version of ubuntu (Hardy Heron, soon to be released), is not yet officially supported, but seems to work fine.
  +   +
=== Problems ===
  +
*A Live CD/DVD created from a system with installed proprietary ATI or Nvidia drivers, when booted, will not load these drivers [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?topic=3430.0] <br>
  +
*When running on a system that is on a [[Loop device|loop mounted image]], like on a [[wubi]] installation, remastersys seems to enter in an "infinite loop" when trying to create an iso from that system. [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=a393521c87cc4bb739e59706268383cb&topic=2224.0]
  +
